name: Promotion Class: Battlerager
description:
Role: Melee Defense

Tempering reckless abandon with caution, this fighter has the defenses to survive the worst battlefields.

Stat Adjustments:
Health +525
Final Mitigations +15%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Mace Mastery
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Whirlwind: Now applies a Barrier.
Neck Slash: Now mitigates 50% of crash damage for 3 seconds after use.
Berserk: Now heals per second damage taken, deals all damage when crash happens.  Striking a Bleeding target grants a 50% mitigation for 3 seconds for the crash.  Gains Damage bonus based on damage taken while Berserking.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Battle Rager promotion class and prevents access to the Titan and Conqueror promotion classes.
